website_summaries.verdict: Outside of being the best massage chair for big and tall users, this model excels at premium foot massages, deep massages, and helping to align your spine.
pros: Extra-large and tall seating area to accommodate everyone
Easy to customize a full body massage
cons: Expensive, but it’s worth every cent

customer_reviews.title: The pressure - squeezing and massage are so strong even at the lowest level that it is painful! There isn't a way to store your settings ...
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well built. The pressure - squeezing and massage are so strong even at the lowest level that it is painful! There isn't a way to store your settings so you have to go through several menus each time you use it. The foot massage is extremely painful. The arm massage pockets sqeezed so hard it burst blood vessels in my arm. The instructions are in broken English. If you a big tough muscular guy this may be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: Man with all the excellent reviews I am a bit puzzled. First I'm only 6'0 200 lbs and can barely fit in this thing. Your back never really feels like its resting against the back of the chair. You get a roller in the behind when you sit down till you get the thing going. Unless I'm missing something nothing is every in contact up around your shoulders what so ever. Yea get a pillow if you want to watch tv while using. I'll to do some more testing and research, maybe missing something.
customer_reviews.author: Redoc

customer_reviews.title: Best chair for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This chair ranks up with the more expensive chairs. Zero gravity over all body massage can't beat it for the price. Use it at least once a day depending on the mood there is at least 10 preset programs I can choose from. There is a manual program you can pin point the area where you want to concentrate on. You feel the 6 roller action from high up your neck to you lower buttocks. It's great!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Received my Kahuna 7300 chair from Good Price World a week earlier then promised
customer_reviews.text: Received my Kahuna 7300 chair from Good Price World a week earlier then promised. Put it together myself in about an hour. Online video was helpful. Chair is as discribe. Easy to operate. Already feel asleep twice using it. Had an issue with foot massage being a little uncomfortable so called. Good Price World and Eric already has sent me shipping info on extra padding for foot massage. No extra charge for padding and they are even picking up cost of shipping. Chair is very quiet. End of review and so back to my new chair.😉
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Updated from earlier review
customer_reviews.text: Updating an earlier review that dealt primarily with the company’s missteps in delivering the item ... though it took a while to fix the delivery problems, the company stood remedied the issues well. As for the actual chair, it’s comfortable and effective. It gives an excellent massage to the middle to lower back. It doesn’t do as well on shoulders and neck, but overall works as intended. I also agree with some of the other reviewers who mentioned intensity of the foot pressure. Even at the lowest intensity setting it feels like it might crush my feet, so I often don’t use the foot massage portion of the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Honestly I think it is an amazing chair! Installation would've been easier if I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad! Honestly I think it is an amazing chair! Installation would've been easier if I didn't have my dad lecturing me the whole time! But it surprisingly has a lot of different modes, including yoga mode and pain relief mode! Also very quiet compared to some other chairs you see at other stores.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Cloudy

customer_reviews.title: I have a job where l sit all day and it has a setting for office person and it's like it knows where I hurt
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how I lived without it. I have a job where l sit all day and it has a setting for office person and it's like it knows where I hurt. Putting it together requires 2 people and 1 must know how to swear.
customer_reviews.author: P. D. Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend this product. Caused stress fracture on foot.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if there is something wrong with this or not but the foot airbags are messed up and quite dangerous. The air pillows were so tight that it caused a stress fracture in my wife's foot from the intense pressure! I just realized tonight that I missed the return window by 2 days. If there is a way to still return this, I would like to. I paid extra to have it assembled and it was worth that. The foot section doesn't seem to be correct. You know the balls are rotating what should be on the bottom of your feet but cannot feel it on the bottom of the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Security Manager

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, great customer service, great delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great chair at a great price. Came in 2 boxes which made it a little easier to get into house and through doorways. Delivery was quick and I was kept informed of progress. Had some minor questions about the assembly and customer service was quick to respond. Love the "L" shaped back massage and the foot massage is pure heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing massage chair
customer_reviews.text: Great massage chair. The feet get squeezed a bit hard but overall it’s amazing, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: D. Gwatkin

customer_reviews.title: but feels great, and so far is totally reliable and consistent ...
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat to our surprise (it was our son's idea) we are really enjoying this chair (as is he). It's not really massage in the hands-on sense, but feels great, and so far is totally reliable and consistent during the two months we've had it. The various options are wonderful, and the foot massage is heavenly. Our biggest complaint is the enormous amount of styrofoam that came with it..... we are having to get rid of it piece by huge piece. Surely there would be other options.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Woollcott

customer_reviews.title: This is a great massage chair !
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the massage chair. I feel that it is handy to have available at home with use available 24/7. I have a full-time job that requires me to be available on call at all hours and travel. I can use this chair any time I come home to relax.
customer_reviews.author: john w

customer_reviews.title: Comes as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I would say the chair comes as advertised. I did research by looking at customer feedback on various models. I based my purchase on that as it's not easy to find models to try. I would say the reviews for this chair are very accurate and you can trust them. only had the chair a couple of weeks but so far so good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Doctor Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have Parkinson's and got a rX. This is helping the present challenges and perhaps future ones. Thanks for the technology at a reasonable price, not that I have another choice.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick W Lloyd, PhD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome massage chair for any price
customer_reviews.text: I use this chair daily for my lower back pain. Love the zero gravity feature. Item arrived early in two large boxes by a freight company as promised. Would highly recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Big Kahuna, indeed!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best buys ever! This has been absolutely wonderful for my feet and back. I love this chair more every single day!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Weir

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Just put it together today! Works great. The back has wheels for easy moving. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: E. Belk

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty good shape
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair last week..It is pretty good shape, color, funtionality.Our family is now enjoying this massage chair. I'm willing to recommend this chair my friends.
customer_reviews.author: ellen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very well built and provides an amazing massage with many features. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality! Awesome range of massage choices. Gives a deep massage to get into the muscles when desired!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L. Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and in good condition. Its a bit of a beast to get up stairs so be sure to have help available if needed. Set up took a couple of hours and was without incident. Once we switched it on we found it's honestly amazing how far these devices have come. This model offers a very thorough feature set and after 2 weeks of use we are thoroughly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Davo

customer_reviews.title: Experience left me needing a real massage
customer_reviews.text: This chair was not worth the money. The pressure was poor. The hip pads also kept popping out of place and the chair creaked horribly during the massage after four days. The company blamed the amazon-provided assembly and I just ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: 30-somethingmomoftwins

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: This is a WONDERFUL chair! We couldn't be happier with this purchase. White glove delivery was excellent also. We just love Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: gac

customer_reviews.title: Best of its range
customer_reviews.text: I have been shopping for a chair for a long time. Try out a lot of different and expensive ones. This is by far the best deal of them all. If you like feet massage this will be the one cause it’s stronger than most other chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Ken. L

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart!
customer_reviews.text: The chair is decent massage but terrible craftsmanship. The side arm won’t stay attached and customer service does nothing. It is assembled correctly the arm just slides onto the bolt. Every time I use the chair the airbags on the shoulders lifts it up enough where it pops off the bolt. Just junk and sad they won’t fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Only last 3 year - Structural Welding Issue
customer_reviews.text: We have this massage chair for under 3 years. No one over 185 lbs has used this chair. We even paid for the service to install it. The chair hasn't been moved since day 1 until we received the instruction to diagnose the piston. As shown in the attached picture, the metal frame where the piston is attached has completely detached. Thus, the message chair can no longer recline. For $$$ we paid, we don't expect a structural issue like this only a year after the 2 year warranty has expired. While the customer support is very responsive, the company is unwilling to do anything to fix this issue due to expired warranty.
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Verdict is still out!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the chair directly from the company. It was $2499 and had free White Glove with a total of 4 years warranty. Watch the Good Price World website for deals. Christmas was a big one. I had major shipping issues (Pilot, I can’t say great things.) Now the chair...I’ve only had it one day. However, I’m extremely pleased and can’t wait to get in it again. It’s a lot of money, but this chair is high quality and does a nice job relaxing you. If issues arise, I’ll update my post. So far 4 stars is the best I can give until I get in it more. I may post a detailed video on the chair too.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Wildcats

customer_reviews.title: Nice Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this directly from Good Price World and couldn't be happier. It's a solid piece of machine and the customer service experience has been excellent. I bought extended warranty to keep a peace of mind as well and feels that I made the right choice. The only complain I had was that the middle of the back cover was ripped due to the poor needling when I only used it for 5 months but they were nice enough to mail me the replacement right away. This is a very nice and relaxing machine although the foot massaging area can be tough if you are not used to it. Overall, I am happy with the choice I've made! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LunaMonaPop

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research and kept coming back to this chair as optimal blend of price and features. It arrived quickly, friendly shippers and easy set up. Most importantly, wife loves it so I’m a rock star...
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Best Massage Chair To Get
customer_reviews.text: I picked up their top of the line SM-9000 and my sister picked up the SM-7300 model chairs recently. I have to say that they are the best looking and performing massage chairs that I have found. I look forward to using it every night before I go to bed, it really works out all of my bodies kinks. You will not be disappointed with either of these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: kraigmont

product_meta.title: Top Performance Kahuna Superior Massage Chair with SL-Track 6 Rollers - SM-7300 (Dark Brown/Black)
feature_bullets: DEAL - Upgraded as 03/01/2018 – Triple Hip airbags, Revised remote controller to more user friendly, air intensity massage up to 5 levels. 2 Years Part & Labor Warranty included

[Total 9 Auto programs including 4 special programs] 5 Auto programs - Yoga Stretching, Fast Recovery, Pain Relief, Relaxation, Athlete and 4 special programs - Office Person, Golfer, Senior Mode, Dynamic Sport – These special programs provide unique massage experience in Zero Gravity position

A progressive Kahuna chair SM-7300 collaborated with top performing technology embedded with variety of different techniques which are kneading, tapping, knocking, tapping + knocking, and shiatsu massage on selective body proportion of whole or partial or fixed point on body. It performs close to human-touch massage as it proceeds the massage like having a personal masseuse in your home

Superior Kahuna Massage Chair SM-7300 accommodate all body types including heavier and bigger body figures adding 3 more inches to the shoulders and hip area to accommodate all body types up to 6ft 5inches and up to 320 lbs. The upgraded Space saving technology using ameliorated forward sliding mechanism allowing quieter transition that only requires 3 inches off from the wall
The SM-7300 functions with 6 rollers provide experience of being massaged by 6 different hands and the whole body being embraced while the massage is being processed

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
